summary: This document is an email chain forwarding a New York Daily News article about Jeffrey Epstein's final days at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York City, as revealed by inmates. The email was sent on December 28, 2020, and discusses the circumstances surrounding Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central subject of the forwarded article, detailing his final days in jail before his death.

events.title: Article on Epstein's final days published
events.description: The New York Daily News publishes an article revealing details about Jeffrey Epstein's final days at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in NYC, as told by inmates.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York City
keyFacts: The document forwards a news article about Jeffrey Epstein's final days in jail.
The article is based on revelations from inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in NYC.
The email correspondence date is December 28, 2020.
